job.title: Software Engineer I (Contract)
job.description: <p>Local candidates only- This position is on-site @ Apple in Cupertino, CA</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>Must haves: </u></strong></p><p>-Software Developer</p><p>-Excellent Fundamentals in one or more of C, C++ or Objective C</p><p>-Wireless automation experience - working with testers (communication and wireless)</p><p>-DevOps Tools -Jenkins</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Key Qualifications: </strong></p><p>-Excellent Fundamentals in one or more of C, C++ or Objective C or a similar language.</p><p>-Basic knowledge of RF/Wireless lab equipment.</p><p>-Experience in developing test solutions/systems.</p><p>Familiarity with data processing and statistical tools.</p><p>-Experience or strong academic background with current wireless/RF standards.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Educational Requirements:&nbsp;</strong></p><p>Bachelor's Degree required</p><p>Master's Preferred</p>
